venue.address_2: Opposite Sears entrance at Galleria Ma
venue.name: VFW

item.description:
Live Music, Singles Networking, Cheap Drinks, Pool table.

Party with Free Live Music in East Cambridge near the Galleria Mall. The venue has very cheap drinks, a relaxed atmosphere, pool table, and free live music with great musicians and an open mike. Here is the ad -

Attention Party goers, Musicians, Singles & Singers!! Come join the party at the Wed Night Open mike! Everyone Welcome. No cover charge - Play pool or music solo or with backing band. All instruments and styles welcome. Originals, covers, blues, jazz, classic rock, R&B, Motown, folk, etc. Back up band with drums, bass, guitar, and Songlist for singers.

This is a great opportunity to further your music experience and career, jam with other musicians, play solo, play originals, and network. The goal is to have everyone play as much as possible. Please come to check this out, have a drink and support this for your Music Guild even if you don't play tonight.


Crystal Bar VFW across from the Sears Entrance of the Galleria Mall near Lechmere. 59 1st St., Cambridge. Weekly open mike Wednesday night - starts at 7PM. Bring your friends for the party, network, play pool, and meet, interesting people & singles. Inexpensive drinks. (bottle beer $2.75 import $3.75 wine $3!!!!)

If you would like to rehearse the songs with the group RSVP for and come to the jam/rehearsal meetup the Sunday prior to the Open MIke. If you can bring song sheets for your songs on one page that will facilitate playing. If you are playing at semi-professional level and are playing solo or don't need to rehearse, just come to the open mike.

If you want to be play with acconpanying bass /lead/harmony try to come early at 7PM and bring about 4 copies of 2 or 3 songs you want to play on 1 sheet per song if possible, so we can all play it.

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Live Music Open Mike, Singles Networking, Cheap Drinks, Pool table.
